findings.description: CORS misconfiguration on WordPress REST API endpoint that allows arbitrary origins with credentials can enable attackers to read sensitive page data from authenticated users' sessions.
findings.exploitation_steps: Create malicious website that sends authenticated requests to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 from victim's browser, potentially exposing private page content or user data if the victim is logged into Plex.
